scripts.deploy:42: rm -rf 42_book && mkdir 42_book && cd 4.2 && git pull origin 4.2 && npm run docs:build && mv _book/* ../42_book/
scripts.deploy:53: rm -rf 53_book && mkdir 53_book && cd 5.3 && git pull origin 5.3 && npm run docs:build && mv _book/* ../53_book/
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:42 && npm run deploy:53 && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push origin gh-pages
